name: SmartMeDeviceConfiguration_Get
description: Gets the configuration of a smart-me device.

$block: API Container class for the meter configuration

$ul: **DeviceEncryptionKey**: The encryption key used to decrypt messages received from an external meter (used only for the smart-me modules)
**DevicePinCode**: PIN code to enter on a external meter (e.g. for the FNN meters)
**DnsUpdateState**: Configuration of the dynamic DNS service. More information: http://wiki.smart-me.com/index.php/Dynamisches_DNS
**EnableModbusTcp**: Enables or disables Modbus TCP (if the meter supports it).
**InputConfiguration**: The configuration for the intput outputs
**OutputConfiguration**: The configuration for the external outputs
**ShowReactiveEnergy**: Shows the reactive energy values (if the meter supports it).
**SwitchConfiguration**: The configuration for the phase switches
**UploadInterval**: Number of seconds the device will upload the data. For smaller values maybe a professional license is needed.
